segments.advisor_message: Alright, before we move on, could you provide me with the full name of your dependent?
Great, and when was Mia born? I need the date of birth in DD-MM-YYYY format.
Thanks! Just one more thing, is there a specific date until when Mia will be considered your dependent?
segments.client_message: Yeah, she’ll be a dependent until she turns 18, so that would be till 15-04-2033.
